alert.note: Alert for Rooks (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 30 at 5:44PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Rooks County through 615 PM CDT... At 543 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southwest of Palco, or 11 miles north of Ogallah, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail, but could be stronger winds and larger hail in southwestern Rooks County if this storm manages to enter the county before weakening. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Palco. It is unclear at this time whether this storm might actually enter Rooks County, and if so, whether it will be severe. It is being monitored closely. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
